Text: Anyone have a serial for it yet?

This is the demo, as the comment says.

You can download it direct from Adobe @ http://www.adobe.com/cfusion/tdrc/index.cfm?product=photoshop%5Flightroom&loc=en%5Fus but it does require an adobe account (Free)

Serial is perfect. It enables the full version. tnx
